body_html:
Having the same issue with TF 1.9.0. 1.5.0 seems to work, but nothing since then.
MacOS 10.12.6 w/ conda, python 3.6:

python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"
Illegal instruction: 4
body_text:
Having the same issue with TF 1.9.0.  1.5.0 seems to work, but nothing since then.
MacOS 10.12.6 w/ conda,  python 3.6:
python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"
Illegal instruction: 4
body:
Having the same issue with TF **1.9.0**.  1.5.0 seems to work, but nothing since then.
MacOS 10.12.6 w/ conda,  python 3.6:

```
python3 -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"
Illegal instruction: 4
```
